definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: do the duty of [[יׇבָם]] to a brother's widow; Pf. [[וְיִבְּמָהּ]] consec. De 25:5 and shall do a brother-in-law's office to her; Imv. [[יַבֵּם אׂתָהּ]] Ge 38:8 (i.e. [[אֵשֶׁת אָחִיְ]] v:a); Inf. sf. [[לאׁ אָבָה יַבְּמִי]] De 25:7 (on nominal sf. as obj. of inf., v. Ges:§ 115 R. 2 ad fin.).
